name: Preposteroids
description:
I built this game in 48 hours for the GTMK Game Jam 2020 - it's my first ever finished game! The theme of the game jam was "Out Of Control".

Preposteroids is a bizarre spin on the classic "Asteroids" formula, where the goal is to stay alive and prevent asteroids from smashing you to pieces.

In Preposteroids, your ship is placed in an arena littered with blocks of bouncy space-jelly. Coming into contact with one of these gelatinous globs will send you hurtling across the arena, which plunges your ship out of control - but could be used to get out of some dire straits!

Many thanks to https://www.pulsarbytes.com/ for making the fantastic Skyboxes available, and to https://www.void1gaming.com for the awesome  soundtrack and SFX. 

Everything else is done by me.

I hope you enjoy!
